oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Functional Type in the Dairy Cow and Its Economic Value to the Industry
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mahoney, Mervyn
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: functional type traits
economic value
longevity
client communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: It is my purpose today to show that functional type traits are of true economic value, for they directly affect longevity. I will maintain that type traits are directly linked to many disease processes, and that it is appropriate for veterinarians to communicate with their clients relative to improvement of such type traits by means of genetic selection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1977; 86-88
